comments.text: SOOO cute. I was worried it might be too cropped and it was not for me. The material feels really nice and it’s not overly bulky. Fits true to size. I typically do L for vests and jackets but the M was perfect.
I’m a size large but bought xl bcuz it my boobs. Am like a mid size body shape (not slim) and this is super cute light weight puffy stylish can’t wait to wear it. Square look. Crop
I love it there’s nothing wrong with it i bought it without reading the comment and when i read the comments i was scared it was gonna be too small but its perfect
The quality is amazing! And it fits exactly the way I wanted it too. I definitely recommend.
Super cute!!! It is already sort of cropped but for a mini vest look size down
Good quality and true to size but I didn't like the way it looked on me.
runs small but still cute
Runs large!!!! Size down 2x
The quality is amazing! And it fits exactly the way I wanted it too. I definitely recommend.

the waist fits really nicely and even better after washing it. i would say size up one since it shrinks a bit in the wash, but the material is on the stretchy side and superrr comfy. one thing is that they're really long, like im 5'8 and they reach the floor... but its a bit better wearing platforms, just a little too long to my liking. I got the size 8, and im roughly 145lbs!! it fits pretty well when I first tried it on and after I washed it, it fits exactly the way I wanted them to fit ( snug but not suffocating )

I adore these pants. The purple color is gorgeous, fit is great and the quality is better than I expected. The pants are a fairly thick/structured material but have just enough stretch to make them comfortable and good fitting. Length is also great (skims top of my feet, but doesnt touch the floor)
For context, I am 5'8", like 145 ish pounds, athletic build with thicker thighs/bum than waist, pretty long legs, and got a size 8 which was the perfect size for me

bro i was really looking forward to these pants only to be extremely disappointed 😭 i got my usual H&M size in pants (that usually fit perfect) and the shape/design of this pair made no sense 😭 it was tight and could barely fit at the top but was HUGE and LONG towards the bottom like wayyy too much excess fabric 
the material and color were super nice tho and I wish it would fit right 
will be returning 
wouldn’t recommend unless you’re like super tall

They are good pants, they were the ones that I most expected, but they fit larger than I thought, so I have to return them 😭. I really wait them to fit me. They are large on the hips.
About the quality, reeeaally good. The fabric it's thick, so It can make them a little uncumfortable. But it's good quality, so you don't see intern pockets or your underwear. That happens a lot with light colored pants. 
About the length, they are really good. I'm 5'9.

These are the most comfortable, flattering pants. The corduroy is good-quality, not thin or flimsy, and they’re well-constructed. They are a little on the long side, I didn’t want to bother with hemming them shorter so I just wear them with a low heel. I’m 5’6”, 120 lbs. and a 6 was perfect for me, I tried an 8 which I could have worn but it was a little looser than I like through the waist and hips.

They are so soft!! I gave 4 stars because I do have a slight gap in the back! I got a size 14 (i’m 5’8 175 lbs usually a 12 but was worried about tightness) but they’re a little loose and the wide bottoms are definitely wide but I like  pants like that sometimes. Overall I love them! I would order true to size if you want them to fit perfectly. If you want a little more room size up :)

ABSOLUTELY IN LOVE!! I was so scared to order because I had never ordered from here before so I was kind of expecting fast fashion quality, meaning that they weren't really going to be corduroy but they are so nice!!! Also really long and has a little more bell-bottom-e than I expected.  I am also really short so I did have to cut off like 8 inches from the bottom.

Great quality heavier weight corduroy and good stretch to the fabric. It’s a bit tight around my waist, but I do have a slight apple shape (my weight is around my midsection) - so that’s just my particular issue. But, as I mentioned, it does have good stretch. I would say that this is true to size. Runs very long. I’m 5’4” and will have to get it altered shorter.

One of the most comfortable pair of pants I own. Fit true to size (10), only issue is they're insanely long on top of being higher waisted than normal, they pool on the floor for me. End of the day though I'd rather them be too long instead of too short and just adjust them!! For now they work fine with my doc platforms! 5'6" 155lbs for reference

I’m a 23” waist and 32” hips and they fit absolutely perfectly. The only thing was the length. For someone who is 5’2” these are almost absurdly long. I folded the leg up once over and for it to be the length I wanted it was probably well over 5”. These would be good if you have long legs. They’re so soft though and really comfortable.

I'm 5'7 and 205lbs, the 18 fits well.  The length reaches close to my toes, which I love. I love the bell bottoms. I have a large stomach n this is high waist, I usually can get away with size 16, but 18 didn't have any room at the waist. Well made, but a little stiff.  Glad it has belt holders, I can still use when I loose weight.

I love these pants! So soft and comfortable. I got them in black and I wish I could have got more colors before they all sold out. I got my usual H&M size but I do wish I'd sized down by one, they're a bit loose through the top and the legs are quite wide, so if that's not your thing these probably aren't your best bet.

Love the cord, fit perfectly in size 10 and love the wide leg, just wish I was a smidge taller at 5’4” everything is long. I wore them with a chunky 3 inch boot and they still hit the ground. If they were only just an inch shorter they would not need to be hemmed. I don’t like the bottoms getting dirty!

Super cute and comfy! The length is long, but thankfully I have very long legs for my height, so it’s a relief to have jeans that aren’t high-waters, even after being washed! They fit perfectly everywhere, and I like that the waist is small/tight enough to fit me properly without any “gaps”!

I would say these are a half size too small. They are tight in waist and hips, (waist for a size 14 is 33 when it is supposed to be 34, and the hips fit tightly. The rise is long but not too long. The inseam is 33, which is about 1.5 inches too long for me. I am 5ft7in and weigh about 155.

I love the look of these pants! The courdory material is super soft and I think the pants fit true to size. There were a few loose strings and the pants are very long, but I would still reccomend purchasing. They look very cute, are comfy, and definitely worth the price.

The bottoms are really large, way bigger then my thigh so unfortunately I will be returning as I don’t like the fit on my personally. However the quality is amazing. The zipper was gold and the button was silver which I found a bit odd but it’s not a deal breaker.

This order waaaaay too big cause I messed up my pants size. When I reordered the pants in my size, it was pretty long so I had to hem it. Other than that, very cute and comfy, since the pant legs are pretty loose, they sometimes rub against each other.

Pants are absolutely great! I’m 5’5 and they’re a bit long but nothing to worry about. Only reason it’s not 5 stars is cos it’s a bit snug on the waist but I think it’s just me since I’m on the chunkier side lol but they’re awesome overall !

words cannot describe how obsessed i am with these pants!! i’m a tall girl and i can never find pants that go all the way down past my ankles and these are the one!! I LOVE THEMM!! but i wouldn’t recommend for anyone 5’5 and below!!

hello. these are actually the most flattering and comfortable pants ever. is you have thick thighs like me and tend to steer away from straight leg type jeans, these are perfect. they are flexible and make my butt look SO good 😀👏

The quality is nice however if you are plus sized I think you should take a few inches off the bottoms. I got a size 18, and I am roughly around 5’6, so I have to take off a lot from the bottle. But the fit feels nice on my body !

these pants are so cute!! they are a bit tight on the hips so if you have larger hips i’d recommend sizing up. they’re true to size on the waist. the only problem is that they’re extremely long so i’ll have to get the hem done.

amazing pants! i would get a size up though, i’m usually a 10, but i got a 12 and they fit just right. they are also very long. i’m 5’4 and had to hem them about 3 inches to ankle length, but maybe that’s just my preference :)

I love them! But they were only available in two sizes up from my normal size - cords notoriously run small so I tried them, but apparently not these! Sadly they are going back and I have a notification on for my true size.

I really like these jeans & they fit well, the only issue I have with them is I bought them in a size 2 with another pair of h&m jeans in a size 0 & they fit virtually the same so it further confirms the sizing is wack.

I’m typically bouncing between a size 4 / 6 & I am so happy I ordered a size 6 because they fit perfectly! I’d personally recommend sizing up because they do seem to fit a bit more snug, but otherwise they’re so cute!

very cute color and I’m addicted to anything corduroy so it’s a win for me. I’m a 10 usually but these feel a little snugger than other H&M pants so keep that in mind. I’m a 31 waist and a 41 hip for reference!

These are going back… they’re not cute on me. I’m a midsize - 14 and these were very tight in the waist and baggy in the legs. Not very flattering and just too tight around the waist… I had high hopes for these

I loved the style of these pants. I bought size 4 which I regularly wear but they were a bit tight on the belly, so I purchased a size 6 which feels more comfortable. They look great with most tops or sweaters.

super cute pants for school! they are a little bit  long even with 3/4 inch platforms (i’m 5’2). and there is a bit of a gap in the back waistband and the front where your stomach would be is a tad bit tight.

Ok, I love these pants. However I’m 5’3” and they are way too long. I wish they made a short size and a long size because they fit perfectly at the top. I’m having someone hem them, but it won’t be the same

Ok, I love these pants. However I’m 5’3” and they are way too long. I wish they made a short size and a long size because they fit perfectly at the top. I’m having someone hem them, but it won’t be the same

I'm 5'6 and typically wear a size 10, it fit perfectly and it's super soft. It is pretty long so I definitely recommend wearing them with shoes that have somewhat of a platform, other than that I love them.

The perfect winter pant to keep warm and cover the full length of my long legs. I love the thickness of these pants, adding an extra layer of warmth with my fleece tights underneath. I LOVE the color too!

These pants are so cute and trendy! They fit like a glove. Very nice quality and they look like the picture! They feel soft on the outside and a little less soft on the inside! Love these pants to death.

The wide leg  style of these cords is great, but the purple color is more of a light dusty pink which didn’t coordinate with my purplish pink shirts . They also do run a little small in waist-hip area.

I’m so obsessed with these!! I want them in every color! Please make more colors!!! 
My only issue is my zipper starts to go down on its own but that might just be my pair. Maybe my zipper is faulty.
I bought size 2 my regular size but it was way too tight on my thighs so had to return. if i were to repurchase i'd size up cause i would've liked a little more room in my waist (it just barely fit).
I love these pants but the length is so long. The waist fit perfectly, but I may need to get these pants altered to fit me. As an alternative, I just rolled the bottom up, and it still looks great!
These pants fit me perfectly. I wear a size 6 in everything and these were true to size. I’m 5’6 1/2 and these ended right by my heel. Which is no problem since I wear combat boots with them.
SIZE. UP. WORTH IT. Quality is amazing! I am usually a 2 when it comes to pants since I have a small waist but I read reviews about these running small, i sized up one and they fit amazing!!
Really comfy and flattering! I normally buy a 4 in H&M pants but decided to go for a 6 for a baggier feel but they ended up fitting perfectly. (I'm about a 27.5 for reference)
I got them a size up because hm pants often run a little smaller on me, so that was smart on my part. However these are LONG. very cute but would recommend trying on in store!
I'm  a little short for these at 5'3". Im stepping on them but i love them. I should have size down one they get a bit loose in the waist but they sold out so nope lol.

love these pants, always true to size, I’m always a 4 in h&m pants
I’m 5’ 3 and they’re a tiny bit too long with regular shoes but are the perfect with platform boots
I LOVE THESE PANTSSS. they hug all the right places. usually its hard to find jeans that fit my bum area but these fit really snug.  they are the perfect length too.
Cute, and definitely worth your money with the great quality and fit, I order this in a 0 and honestly true to size as a 5,1 it runs long but that isn’t an issue
they are very soft and i love the look of them but they were snug when I first got them and the size 4 looked like a size 2 but hopefully they will stretch out.
They fit fine but look deliberately oversized (in a good way).  Super long and need a bit of hemming.  The color is very pretty & the corduroy is light & soft.
I shop H&M often, and; as an experienced customer I know to go one size up.  I'm a size 6, so I bought an 8. They fit perfect!! They super comfy and soft too.
Cute pants! They are a bit long so be mindful of that when purchasing. I am 5’5” and I weigh 125 pounds and they fit my waist perfectly —just a bit too long.
The pants are super cute, but they are soooo long. I’m 5’3 but H&M pants aren’t usually too bad length wise. But these were like 6 inches too long ):
Good material, but I had to return because they’re sooo long. Also the zipper and the button are two different colors which is a little odd lol.
these jeans are the best!!! they look great and feel so soft. I got this in both black and beige. I'm so glad I got these! 100% recommend them.
Im a size 4 and 5’4. They are great quality and very warm but they are way too long for my short self. I will definitely be getting them fixed.
Fit perfectly at the waist but is way too long for someone short like me. Im 5’1 so it was probably going to happen, I’m getting them tailored
great quality, just a little long like others have mentioned, i’m 5’4 and this was a bit of a puddle at the bottom and had to roll them up
Love these pants so much! They are bigger in cuffs for the legs of the pants, but I don’t mind. I’ll just pair them with a platform shoe.
I LOVE!!! So cute with Chelsea boots, heels, or sneakers. Little my favorite pair of pants from H&M. Length is  pretty long and I’m 5’6.
i am super impressed with these pants. they are very high quality and fit very well. i am 5’8 and these pants were pretty long on me!!
From reviews I was told to size down. However, h&m runs small anyway so I should've gotten a size 6. Also they were just way too long.
its literally perfect!!! favorite new pair of pants, but it just runs a little bit longer than i wanted. just off by an inch or two!
LOVE THESE! Definitely size up, I am 5'9" and weight ~140ibs and usually am a size 4, but I sized up to a 6 and they fit perfectly.
Literally so cute. They look a little weird on me because I have large thighs. They are very big at the bottom which is super nice.
I wanted to love these so badly but they are so extremely wide it looks a little ridiculous. They’re about a half size too small.
Absolutely love how these fit. I did have them tailored because they run long and very wide towards the end. They’re so cute.
Perfect fit and true to size. I am 5’5 and about 135lb and got a size 4. Pants are a little long but that was to be expected.
I sized up and they fit perfect and the waist hips but and legs but for someone that’s under 5’3 they are drag on the floor.
The fit of this pant is really strange. It’s tight up top but then it flares out around the knees and it runs pretty long.
Love the color and a little long but with platforms they will be good, the top part looks weird but still great pants
i love love love these pants although they do run a bit long but i like it like that so it wasn’t a problem for me!
love these pants, they fit great & I got so many compliments. got my usually size & the waist & length was perfect
idk they just weren't that flattering and the size 2 waist was super tight. they were also super long. im 5'3 so
Really stretchy and perfect length and hug all the good places makes you look amazing!! WOULD 10/10 recommend
Super cute and soft plus they fit great just a bit longer than I expected. One of my favorite pair of pants.
these are so weird. they fit beautifully but the pant legs are enormous. like literally parachute pants.
Very cute. Legs are MASSIVE and waaaaay too long. I am 5’10 and they still touch the ground when I walk.
Really wish the thigh area wasn’t tight, especially seeing as the bottoms are wide. Not good ratios
THESE FIT SO GOOD !!!! love the beige color would def recommend. good for y’all ppl like myself
Pants were far too long and I’m quite tall. Waist was a little small, but this brand always is.
Super comfortable to wear and very flattering color. It is a little tight so not true to size.
these pants flatter my body so well and the corduroy feels great i highly suggest buying these
It’s very unproportional. The pant legs are too long, but the zipper area is a bit too small.

Love the feel and the fit. Style is great. 
I would love to a second pair in another color.
Sizing was completely off but the quality was great. I was gutted that I had to return it.
These pants are perfect but the legs are a bit more flared then they appear in the picture
These pants so beautiful the color stands out! The corduroy and these pants is so soft!
I did not like how wide they are at the bottom. Although the waist is very comfortable
super in love with my pants!!! it just runs about an inch or two longer than expected.
My new favorite pants! They fit perfectly to my normal size and are very comfortable.
Cute material and color, but runs crazy long!! I had to hem 6 inches off each leg :(
Nice. But too long for me. I’m 5.1. But it’s true size on me. Wish I can request 29”
they fit okay on my waist just a little tight on my thighs. really cute i like them
They’re incredible. The material is amazing and it fits perfectly around the waist.
These jeans fit perfectly and go along with everything 10/10 definatly go but these
Its simply beautiful, true to size, its a bit long but nothing that can’t be fixed

I love these :) 
Im 5’3 and they’re ever so slightly long, but they’ll be fine.
Great quality...wish they were longer...for heels and females with long legs!
I ordered two sizes too big and they fit perfectly. They were also very long.

This joggers are great quality, warm perfect for fall/winter. Regular rise, I'm xs in other types of pants but an xs fitted me nicely not to tight not too loose neither. I'm 5'-7" and it's just the right length.
So comfortable and cute
Love the fit

it’s definitely an oversized fit and i love it! i got it in black. i’m 120 lbs w/ 28in ish waist & i usually wear M but got a S in this and it fits like a M-L. i’m also 5’2” and it hits just below my behind but in the front it’s a little higher. the quality is alright i think, it’s on the thinner side but not too thin and it’s warm size the inside is just barely fuzzy. i’ve been looking for a crewneck with a mock neck though so i’m super happy with it so far it looks so cute and it’s comfortable enough! after one wash it hasn’t shrunk much if at all.

I really wanted to love this sweatshirt. I am a size S or M in most tops, after reading other reviews, I went with a small thinking this would be oversized. It was a little oversized, but hit tight around my butt and thighs, I would have been much happier with a medium or large. The material was also very thin, which I wasn’t expecting. I guess I don’t feel like it was worth the price, I’m used to H&M’s thicker quality sweatshirts and hoodies.

Perfect oversized sweatshirt. Love the poofy sleeves at the cuffs. Very comfortable and warm. Fits me (size elsewhere is 3x 55" bust) with room to spare. I knew it would run large so I sized down, but if you're not used to H&M sizing it may be a surprise. Size down accordingly.

All in all I'm very happy with my purchase.

Terrible quality. The inside of my washing machine looked like a crime scene after I washed these sweatshirts. There was red  fuzz and lint from the inside of the sweatshirt everywhere. After drying, I could not even get the little balled up pieces of lint off of the outside of the sweatshirt.

I bought the Red sweatshirt but it's actually a "red orange". It's a very nice color but I would have preferred a true red. The fabric is thick & soft not itchy at all. I'm 5'7 & 173lbs and I got the small, it's truly oversized. The small fits nicely, still oversized but looks nice.

I got this in a M. I’m 5’8” and 135lbs and this fits AMAZING! It has the adorable balloon sleeve look to it and fits my SUPER long arms perfectly i can put it past my wrists if i want as well! this is tall girl approved. i think a size S would’ve been too fitting/short on my wrists

Really love this sweater but omg the shedding of interior is insane. Sweater balls everywhere. And washing? You have to wash it alone multiple times (I’m on 3rd wash and the little balls are still covering the washing machine). My undershirt was absolutely ruined. Not worth it!

Super soft and comfortable! Not thick or heavy, which is great for spring/summer. My only issue is that it kinda pills and gets fuzz everywhere, but no biggie, I've had sweatshirts that did worse. The most gorgeous color! I'd say size up 1 size for that perfect oversized look.

Absolutely not. Super thin - like soft paper. More of a red tone on site - orange based red in person. Wide - wide - ridiculously wide. If has absolutely no structure. It’s wide (did I already mention that?) it’s very wide. Size down by a minimum of 2 possibly 3 sizes.

Really bummed about this. I ordered both the black and the gray and they are two completely different sweatshirts. The fit is so off and the neckline is more like a turtleneck. I'll be returning the gray one. Just a heads up.
So comfy and cute! I've gotten many compliments on it.  Turtlenecks and mock turtles go really well with this sweatshirt if you're planning to wear some extra layers under it for the winter season.
Really soft and comfortable.  Beautiful orange red color.  Like the oversized fit to wear over leggings or sweatpants.  It does shed a lot though on the first wash, but not terribly so.
The product is as described. The material is soft and seems like decent quality. I like that the length is longer than normal sweaters. For reference, I'm 5'6" and about 130 pounds.
sooo soft but the material grabs onto every piece of fiber and lint and hair it can get. Usually wear a L or XL but I got a M.. would of gotten a small if could.
the fit i've been looking for!!!! so so so oversized and cute. i love it!!! also, it has a tighter fit on the neckline which i really like!
I love the way this felt and looked, but WOW is it HUGE! I’m returning and getting a smaller size. When they say oversized they mean it lol
Returned. 5’4” 106lb S was enormous. XXS Wldve been too big. Loved the bright red color so sad. Unbelievably wide. Sleeves cut low too.
Runs true oversized. I sized down to a med and it is a perfect oversized fit, not too big not too regular fit. Usually I am a LG.
literally in love but i wanted it big so i ordered an XL when i typically wear a M so if you want it oversized def size up
For me this was horribly ill-fitting. It is a bit thinner than I had expected, but good color. I like the long sleeves.
Perfect oversized fit! I’m 5’6 and the small was just long enough to cover my booty without looking overly-oversized.
I don’t like that it’s long from the back and short from the front. Didn’t notice that. But it’s nice and simple
I love the color & oversize look of this sweatshirt! I would still have sized up one more time for a L
Comfort has become what I do these days. So this is comfortable, colorful and washable, I love it.
I got a medium and its very nice/comfy and warm. One of my favorites!
Love this Sweatshirt!  Perfectly oversized, I have it in 5 colors!
Maybe  little too oversized and boxy. Bringing this one back....
Love it! The inside of the sweatshirt is very soft, like wool
It is  oversized so comfy and soft my new favorite sweater !
love this! got it in blue too! it’s meant to be oversized
oversized but not ridiculously so. very cute.
got this in blue too! meant to be over sized
Shed really bad. But the feel is very cozy.
Light weight and comfortable!  Love it 🥰!
Incredibly soft and perfectly oversized.
It’s really comfortable and warm.
Very soft & comfortable! love it
Good color. Comfy! But too thin.
Runs very large. Super Comfy.
Did like how it looked on me.
Found a chic sweat pants set
fits larger and i like that
Oversized and perfect
Perfect iversized fit
Oversized and perfect
Oversized and perfect
Oversized, so comfy.
Comfy & baggy feel
I really love it
Love the color!
Very oversized!
So comfortable
Did not fir
Its wierd
So soft!
Obsessed
Love it
love it
Love it
Too big
Don't  like how the sweater falls on the body. Cutie style  just not for me.
Way shorter than it looked like it would be. It is also see-through. :(
Nice thick knit, gorgeous color. Hits nicely at my waist.
love it so cute i got this in so many colors
super cute
Is cute
Love
Amazing but very oversized So I recommend to go a size down but other than that go buy this!
It was more oversized than I thought it would be
It was more oversized than I thought it would be

This joggers are great quality, warm perfect for fall/winter. Regular rise, I'm xs in other types of pants but an xs fitted me nicely not to tight not too loose neither. I'm 5'-7" and it's just the right length.
So comfortable and cute
Love the fit
I ordered a large which is my size and it fits perfectly. The armholes are kind of large but I think that's just the style of the vest. The bottom comes to the top of my trousers. Very preppy look
Lightweight feel even though the cotton stitch is thick. A little low in the armpits to wear as a regular tank without a bra showing but I don't mind
Love it! Great for business casual or a preppy comfortable look 😄
Very nice sweater vest, but not oversized at all
Such a cute vintage like jacket. Sizes up for an oversized look and I am in love. Don’t think twice about buying this item!
Love this jacket it’s very rare into between to find a varsity jacket with a “R” so I love it
Love it! I size down for a slimmer  fit.
Love love love
Rock & roll! Very Westwood circa 1980s. LOVE
Very cute! Runs big!

I love how the length is perfect. I wish it could be more fitted on my body because there is still room left. I wouldn’t size down either since I have a huger chest, but my waist is smaller. Super cute though!
So comfy and it's stretchy. For a fitted tight look, would size down. For comfort, going with usual size should be fine. Hits right above my  knee.
Love the dress but the buttons are a little tough to button
Fits good. Little loose on me. I’m 107 pounds.
I ordered a large which is my size and it fits perfectly. The armholes are kind of large but I think that's just the style of the vest. The bottom comes to the top of my trousers. Very preppy look
Lightweight feel even though the cotton stitch is thick. A little low in the armpits to wear as a regular tank without a bra showing but I don't mind
Love it! Great for business casual or a preppy comfortable look 😄
Very nice sweater vest, but not oversized at all

This is the second one of these I’ve bought (I have purchased both pink and yellow) and I’m honestly considering buying a blue and green as well! This is exactly what I was looking for— warm and soft without being too thick (think: thinner than brandy Melville crystal hoodie but thicker than a Walmart time and tru zip up). Colors are PERFECT! Be aware that it’s definitely a bit short but it is meant to be cropped and a bit fitted. I’m 5’5, 130lbs, 32D and I got a large for a bit of a looser fit. Would recommend sizing up one size if you’re wanting it a bit roomier. I think the jacket really is true to size if you’re going to be wanting the fitted look that’s on the model.

It is nice. It runs very small.  I wear either  S or M.  I purchased XL. It fits fine. (I am 5'-4" & 130 lbs. & fit.)  I did put in in the dryer. Didn't seem to shrink. I took one star off because I think all H&M clothes should be able to be tumble dry. I use a public laundromat. It needs the dryer to kill the germs. And who wants to drag home wet clothes and hang them round the small apartment! I wish they would make it in a terry to match the bucket hats!  Even a french terry would be great!

5’7, 34C 
I got the large for sleeve length and based on other reviews, usually I wear medium or small. Glad I did, it’s still cropped which is expected but the sleeves are a great length. I think it might have been too short if I got medium. It’s not roomy in the rest of the jacket but I don’t expect to zip it up that often. It’s soft on the inside!

I don’t know if it’s because I have broad shoulders or what but I had to size up to a L for a comfy fit. I’m usually a size S-M in jackets. The L fit comfortably for me. I have 27 waist and 32.5 bust. My shoulders are about 16 in. across. The jacket not really running true to size for me is why I gave it 4 stars. Sizing up gave a nicer result!

Update: I bought this in black as well. It did not was well. Haven't washed this one yet. Quality is not there after washing. Not the usual H & M fleece that lasts. Very cheap & flimsy& does not hold shape. Sorry to say- but save your $.  Style is good. Color is bad, not as pictured- should be a more olive green.

I'm a DD cup.. I ordered an XL it fits very comfortable but for the extra comfort I could've sized up to XXL.. must have piece nice material soft.. Curious to see how it holds up in the washer... Must have.. I luv it wish it was in Olive Green..

So cute and comfy but definitely runs a little short. I am 5'11" and got an XL but it was a bit more cropped than I expected. Still love it, I just make sure to wear high-waisted pants so my stomach doesn't show too much.

This is very cute. I love the color and look of it! It is very adorable and fits super well. The hoodie is also very soft and thick. Great for when it gets cold. The quality is amazing and looks just like the pictures.

the quality is amazing and it feels very smooth, however, the pockets kind of dangle out of the sweater which doesn’t look so good. Other than that, it’s a nice sweater still, so you should definitely check it out.
Such a cute and comfortable sweatshirt. I’ve been looking for a cropped sweatshirt forever and this one fits me just right. I got a small and it’s the perfect amount of cropped but not tight.
SOO CUTEE just the right room in the hoodie! Just what I was looking for. I usually wear medium and was afraid it might be too small but its true to size! It is short but it was expected
I love this sweatshirt so much it fits perfectly and it's super soft.  I am 5'7" and ordered a M. It is perfect to wear over jeans or casually over sweatpants and I can wear it anywhere.
It's really cute and made of good fabric, but it runs very small. I ordered a size Small, but it's really tight around the arms and I couldn't zip it up comfortably; definitely size up.
I usually wear a medium but I ordered the large here since I knew it was a cropped zip up. The large fits perfectly and is a great match with the sweatpants! I suggest to size up!
Beautiful color I love it hehe I’m usually a size M  But I got the L for a nontight fit, it goes right above my belly button and I also have small tetas, I hope this helps!
Love the crop look to the goodies, I have it in navy and black, but black is in size lg, both for well just wanted a lil extra room so if you want an oversized look size up

It is in black. In a cute crop...  And a hoodie?! .... did I mention oh so soft and comfy when you slip it on? ?!!
Yes, this is my everyday hoodie. I mean EVERYDAY 👀😎👌
The best cropped hoodie you can get. I have broad shoulders but slim arms and I wear a 32C. This jacket is fitted on me which is what I was going for. A perfect basic!
Talk about warm this jacket is great and it is really cut...bought the jogger bottoms to go wit it and got a great outfit for under 30 dollars...go up a size or two
I found it in stores locally where I live but they didn’t have my size I already have this in light blue and I they’re very comfortable!! I love these hoodies ❤️❤️
I’m 5ft and thought cropped would run big on me— I was wrong lol  Jacket fits well and is overall comfortable, just a bit more cropped than I thought it would be
It’s a cute and comfortable hoodie however it is a little too cropped than I thought. If you don’t want the hoodie too cropped I recommend going a bigger size.
It’s really nice and soft! Also isn’t any thinner than a normal sweatshirt. It is a bit short, so I’d recommend sizing up if you want it past your rib line.
Super cute. Excited to wear it over workout gear this winter. I’m 6’ 175lbs and size M was perfect. Could have gotten a large for an oversized look.
This is cropped but not too bad. It's a little snug and the inside of the jacket got on my white shirt. I may have to wash it before initial use.
I bought xs size. It fits me perfectly. I love it so much. Highly recommend buy it if you like crop sweater. Quality is good. Perfect for spring.
Really cropped. I ordered in a size medium thinking it would be a bit baggy but it's still super tight and short. Really pretty color in person.
sleeves fit really well and is extremely comfy for its price. the only downside is the length, i knew it was cropped but it’s veryyy cropped.
Runs very small and short.  A true cropped jacket.  Reminds me of the cropped jackets we used to wear around 2008.... but not in a cute way.
Super comfy and cute to wear as a lounge set. Inside is very soft. Yellow will wash you out a little if you are paler but still cute!
cute but fit weird… this is my usual size for h&m jackets since i like an oversized fit but this was just too small. am returning :/
Shrank during drying even though it claims to be fine in the dryer, so I would size up. Otherwise a cute, quite cropped sweatshirt.
Haha - was surprised when I opened this and it’s a cropped sweatshirt.  But love it just the same -I missed the key work “short”.
Very cute and a great size! I'm only returning because I want a different color, but SIZE UP because it's a pretty short crop.
Love this! I recommend trying in store because it is very short and you might want to size up for a looser, more stylish fit
So short! I’m normally always an XS in H&M, and I got a size S, and it was very tight and short! (Like a kids sweatshirt !)
Very short and I even sized up.  Also I know it’s supposed to be cropped but the pockets being on your boobs is awkward.
I wear this honestly everyday and love it. only downside is that it pills pretty easily, but it’s not that noticeable!
I love this! Super soft and cute. I have bigger boobs and long arms but it fit me fine. 5’9 140lbs got a medium.
Super cute and soft, can wear it with anything! I have longer arms so I got a medium and the length is perfect.
I love cropped jackets that hit at my natural waist but this was too short! I do have a long torso, though.
Glad I got xl to fit comfy if I would of got a large it would of been too snug recommend sizing up
Smaller than I thought. H&M's sizing is so inconsistent. This fit more like an x small or xx small
I probably should of sized up on this one. The large fits a bit too short and close to my body.
Really nice material is like thick but thin at the same time. Color is just like the picture.
i’m in love with this hoodie!! it’s super cute. the material is very soft and comfortable.
Overall very cute, but it was really cropped! More so then it seems in these pictures.
Cute! The pockets are in a little bit of an awkward place but I don’t really care
Jacket Fits well. Jacket hasn’t  been washed yet. I’m not sure if it will shrink.
loved it I’m 5’2 138lbs I order large fits perfect I want to get all the colors
it’s pretty white but collects a lot of lent when washing and fades just a bit
shorter than i expected but it’s very cute! definitely size up for this one.

I ordered a medium and usually wear a small bit this was still too small.

Was looking for a simple white tee that wasn't a baby tee or incredibly oversized (because I have far too many of those). This really hits at the perfect length, but the sleeves were a little longer than I thought? Will still be wearing it, was just a little surprised at the sleeves. This is probably because it is a "boxy" fit, so as long as you keep that in mind, you will probably love having this staple in your wardrobe.

I love these shirts!!!! I have them in black, pink, and white! My bust is 38” and my waist is about 31”. The one thing is that before you wash them they are waaaay too big :) they shrink up a lot though, I would just order your normal size. The material just feels like standard cotton so you don’t need to worry about weirdly silky or scratchy material! They are also NOT cropped but they aren’t really long either :)

I'm 5'6" size 14 pear shaped. For me the shirt length is great (not too long or short)s too boxy looking. I don't like the neck hole, it's too close in and if I try to stretch it out (pulling on the sides of the shoulder seams) it makes the way the shirt hangs look weird. Returning.

I'm 5'6" size 14 pear shaped. For me the shirt length is great (not too long or short)s too boxy looking. I don't like the neck hole, it's too close in and if I try to stretch it out (pulling on the sides of the shoulder seams) it makes the way the shirt hangs look weird. Returning.

Runs large as I expected but also not as cropped as I thought which was a nice surprise. The material is thick and high quality. Wanted an oversized tee to go with some black linen pants and these fit the bill.

this is such a cute shirt and i was able to match it with some light pink shorts i got from h and m- it’s a bit lighter in the fabric than i thought but still could
Perfect length, exactly like description. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a shirt that’s not too long but not really cropped!

Love the color and the cut. Just not long enough to tuck in my high waist jeans, but its still a look not tucked anyways

cutest jeans ever!! i’m usually a 00 but i HAD to have these and these fit me great!! i feel more secure with a belt, but without it is just as perfect. they’re slightly darker in person which i love. If you are more on the short side, i recommend wearing these with platformed shoes.

These low flared jeans are heaven sent! The perfect fit, my only problem would be the length.. they were too long on me and folding them didn’t help. I am 5’3/5’4 and I got a size 2 in light denim. I may get them hemmed or cut them myself because these are worth it. GET THESE!

I wasn’t expecting these jeans to be that great bcos the price was incredibly low , they are absolutely exceptional quality. Im also shocked for once a pair of jeans from H&M that fit me perfectly in my normal size. Ordering the dark gray pair too..

These are definitely not for petite girls!  They fit awesome at the waist but they are so long!  And wide at the bottom!  However I’m gonna make it work and cut them, maybe get them tailored because they’re otherwise perfect

Im usually around a 10/12 I ordered these in a 10 and they where still loose even with a belt 
Also they just looked weird I’m 4’11 so I’m used to H&M pants being long/wide but these just did not look right

These fit great … its normal 12 oz denim (heavy), the rise is not to high so its more modern than a high rise. I took a size 14 and I am 5’5” and 164lbs. Length is long on me but I am about to hem them.
I got these same exact jeans in a lighter color and they fit perfectly. then i bought these in the same size and they would not go past my thighs. i had to return them. i don’t understand the sizing
Super cute but VERY low and snug in the inseam. Like it showed some outline of something (if you know what I mean). So sadly they went back. I think they’re good for a wee little person.
I LOVE THEM SO MUCH it’s the first time that pants fit me GREAT 😉 cause the they fit me good on thigh which I like and on the knee it is not tight WHICH I ABSOLUTELY LOVE 💗 😚😉🥹🤪🥺
Omg these are sooooo cute and fits well! I’m about 5’7 with thick thighs and a 14 fits perfectly. It’s not stiff at all, it’s soft and has a little stretch.
these jeans are very cute and they fit extremely well on my hood/waist, just not much flare, they're long on me but that was expected
NEW FAV JEANS!! had to get them altered at the ends bc they were too long, but the quality is amazing. they are super cute!!
It fits perfect. I’m 5’6 and got a size 4. A lil bit long but with shoes it’d be fine. A pair of jeans I was looking for!!
A little long but literally fit like a second skin. Super flattering and not too tight. Measurement are 22 waist/35 hips
Totally love them I’m a size 12 in stretching jeans but I ordered a 14 since this is real jean and the fired great 🥰
Pretty nice, fits perfect. A little bit long but with hight snickers or boots looks perfect. Recommended.
Just be aware it’s that very heavy denim they used for farmers in the 1970s! Not at all flattering.
I love these so much they’re kind of long though and i’m 5’5” for reference but kind of like that
Love the wash and the flare is nice! I’m 5’2 so they are long in me but with boots they are fine
I already had these in light denim blue and those were longer than the regular denim blue pair
A little on the tighter side but if you wear them for a little they stretch!! very low rise
I love these jeans! Comfortable and they look great. And the pockets are actually pockets!
if your shorter than 5’2 i don’t recommend cause these jeans will drag on the floor
LOVE. Flattering and comfortable. Nice change from everything being high-waisted.
amazing low rise jeans - true to size, I’m 5 3 and always a 4 in H&M pants
Return because the were at least 3 inches too long- they were cute jeans
very low rise and i went up a size and it fit perfectly
Love them! They are super comfortable and are so cute!
not used to low rise jeans but they’re cute !!
A little low & a little long but I love them.
I like the style color and fit
Fit perfectly. Very comfy
These jeans are amazing.
Love them
Nice

I love these pants! I have another pair in the blue denim color but after I wear it, it’s stretched out in the waist and too big so I ordered a size down from my normal size and it’s still fits me great. There is slight give and stretch to the pants. I’m 5’6 and have a 31” inseam and these pants bunch slightly at the ankles which is the intended look. Overall I love these pants and I recommend.

Im obsessed with these jeans !!! I wear these all the time and they’re literally perfect. The sizing is just right. The waist is not too tight, which i love because then Im never super uncomfortable after eating and being bloated. The length is also perfect ! They hit just the bottom of my heels. I recommend these !!

these fit pretty true to size!! i wish that the waist was maybe an inch smaller but the fit is great. and sooo thankful for the stretch too. i have bigger thighs and a butt so these fit really well for being straight cut jeans! def recommend, i wear 16 in almost every divided collection pant/jean!

I love these jeans! They fit pretty well, just a little big in my waist. I don’t blame the product for this though because I have this issue with pretty much all my jeans, and it’s a super easy fix. Love the baggy look, would highly recommend! For reference, I’m 110 lb and a little over 5’6”.

Love these! They’re comfortable and stretchy so they don’t suffocate you when you sit down. The loose legs are very comfortable. They are pretty long, though. I bought a 4, and I’m 5’5/130lbs. I roll them up and it solves the problem, but can’t wear them without rolling them.
Got my normal size and they fit perfectly on the thighs so happy I got them. Definitely recommend! I’m around 4”11/5’1 so they run long on me but I cuff them at the bottom and it works for me.
The waist fits a little big but I finally found a pair of jeans that go over my thighs and booty. Unfortunately the stitching on the left side was pretty weak and ripped open :(
I love everything about these jeans except the fact that they’re too long on me. I’m 5”2’ though so I get it but it’s a bit annoying. Other than that they were a perfect fit.
In love with these! A little long for me as someone of average height, but they look great cuffed! Fit my waist perfect, and the graphics look so cute!
Overall quality is great but there isn’t a zipper, instead there are multiple buttons. It can be a hassle for some, so keep that in mind.

Love these jeans! Definitely give the 90s vibes!
My only complaint is that the waist is small but they are really loose everywhere else.
Nice jeans but I can't with the buttons instead of a zipper. It's hard and time consuming to do, especially when I have nails on lol.
I personally just don’t like how instead of a zipper, there’s about 5 buttons to button up your pants. Besides that, they’re good!
Love how these jeans feel. Comfy and stretchy to give it a baggy look. So comfortable on the sides, definitely recommend them!
i wanted to love these but they’re soooooo long and big  :( im 5’2 n 110 and a size 2 was a little big at the waist and hips
These jeans fit perfectly! I bought a size 6 when I’m usually a size 8 in American eagle. Absolutely obsessed with these!
